meanings.sent1: The overproportioned cake towered over the table.
meanings.sent2: The elephant looked overproportioned next to the tiny mouse.
meanings.sent3: The overproportioned hat made everyone giggle at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her overproportioned laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The overproportioned mountain cast a long shadow over the valley.

meanings.definition: Out of proportion in size or scale.
meanings.sent1: The overproportioned chair dwarfed the small desk in the room.
meanings.sent2: The overproportioned painting seemed to overwhelm the entire wall.
meanings.sent3: His overproportioned excitement for the movie was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The overproportioned storm cloud loomed ominously in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The overproportioned flower stood out among the rest in the garden.
